title: Lettuce Love Cafe - Kindfood
typeOfFood: Vegan, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Catering
description: Lettuce Love Cafe is Canada's first 100% gluten-free and vegan restaurant. Born from a passion for making delicious, healthy and sustainable food that has a real impact on health and the planet, it is also rated the #1 restaurant in Burlington and the region. Award-winning farm-to-table, local, organic, plant based cuisine. Serving everyone from everywhere. Enjoy the cozy and vibrant interior or the beautiful sunny garden patio, or call in for take-out. Find it on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. Also checkout its book, "Made With Love - recipes from Lettuce Love Cafe and Kellyâ€™s Bake Shoppe."
